summary: The module defines a collection of microbenchmark suites that exercise various JAX API operations—such as array creation, device transfers, JIT compilation, pjit/pmap execution, sharding utilities, and XLA abstractions—to measure their runtime characteristics using the google_benchmark framework.
business_intent: Provide developers and performance engineers with quantitative measurements of JAX API overheads, enabling profiling, regression detection, and optimization of high‑performance machine‑learning workloads.
